name: Tidey Up
description:
The theme for Ludum Dare 50 was "delay the inevitable", so naturally, we made a game loosely about climate change. In Tidey Up, you play as a penguin named Pingu whose house at the beach is being flooded by the rising sea level. Gather up bits of wood to build your house taller and delay the inevitable destruction of your lovely coastal getaway.

This game was made in Godot by the following people:

  • Programming by Peter Wallis and Jordan Harrison 
  • Art by Ala' Diab
  • Sound Effects by Ala' Diab
  • Music by Jordan Harrison
